eztv, thanks a lot for your ups!
One thing though - the audio on this season is very hard compressed and/or "expanded", possibly this is a setting in the ripping software you use to enhance the audio. It could also be called something like "maximizer". It flattens out the dynamics of the audio track, making the background sounds a lot louder than they should be. Maybe you'd like to check it out and have a listen.

Again thanks so much for the super quality, and hope that was helpful.

I wonder if all the people saying 'It's an OLD EPISODE!' were equally puzzled by The Two Towers; as with that film the start of the episode repeats a sequence from a previous episode and then continues the story from the perspective of another character. Thus begins the best episode of Breaking Bad to date.

Thanks for your uploads. Very happy with the quality of all the eztv episodes, although for some reason I had an audio synch problem this one and episode 9 when using ConvertXtoDVD. If anyone else has this problem, you need to set the source file audio for these episodes to -6000ms.
